statements: DELETE FROM FoodRecallSystem WHERE id = 100 AND recall_date = '2021-05-15';
DELETE FROM FoodRecallSystem WHERE contamination_level > 5 AND batch_number = 'LOT123';

DELETE FROM Recall WHERE product_id = 5 AND recall_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Recall WHERE product_id = 1 AND status = 'active';
